title: North Korea Reports Its First Covid Cases
news_summary: Pyongyang declared a “maximum emergency” and ordered all of the country’s cities and counties to lock down to fight the spread. Get Covid news.

title: U.S. Inflation Is Still Climbing Rapidly
news_summary: Annual inflation moderated for the first time in months in April, but the Consumer Price Index still increased 8.3 percent, an uncomfortably rapid pace.

title: Surfside Condo Collapse Victims Reach $997 Million Settlement
news_summary: The settlement, which includes insurance companies, developers and other defendants, comes nearly a year after the tragedy killed 98 people.
